pageProduct.description:

General Information

Herbal Tea to assist with pain and inflammation, digestion

Common Uses

Pain relief, Inflammation

Ingredients

Turmeric, Peppermint, Liquorice Root, Fennel Seed, Calendula, Blue Cornflowers

Directions

Add 1-2 teaspoons per cup, infuse in water up to 90C, steep for 3-5 minutes
